Systematic eye check at birth, 2 months, 4 months, between 9 and 24 months, 2-3 years, 5 years (6th<sup>year</sup>)

Very frequent anomalies: 1 in 5 children under 6 years of age

question.question: What is the recommended schedule for systematic eye checks in children?
question.option_a: Systematic eye check at birth, 2 months, 4 months, between 9 and 24 months, 2-3 years, 5 years, and every year thereafter
question.option_b: Systematic eye check at birth, 2 months, 4 months, between 9 and 24 months, 2-3 years, and 5 years
question.option_c: Systematic eye check at birth, 2 months, 4 months, between 9 and 24 months, and 5 years
question.option_d: Systematic eye check at birth, 2 months, and 4 months, with no further checks until school age
